comments:
You'll get these displayed when certain files are invalid.  We should catch 
exceptions.


org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Document root element is missing.
	at org.apache.crimson.parser.Parser2.fatal(Parser2.java:3339)
	at org.apache.crimson.parser.Parser2.fatal(Parser2.java:3327)
	at org.apache.crimson.parser.Parser2.parseInternal(Parser2.java:635)
	at org.apache.crimson.parser.Parser2.parse(Parser2.java:333)
	at org.apache.crimson.parser.XMLReaderImpl.parse(XMLReaderImpl.java:448)
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.xsd.ui.internal.dialogs.types.xml.XMLQuickScan.getTagInfo
(XMLQuickS

We should resolve this by M4.  We should handle invalid files better 
(especially since we may scan the entire workspace... and there could be many 
invalid files in that scope).
I believe this should be fixed now.
Looks ok to me in RC5a.
